up.description: The parent tag for the tag.

isnow.description: Set to an updated tag if the tag has been renamed.

doc.description: A short definition for the tag.

doc:url.description: A URL link to additional documentation about the tag.

depth.description: How deep the tag is in the hierarchy.

title.description: A display title for the tag.

base.description: The tag base name. Eg baz for foo.bar.baz .
